featured.title: Bindamy Mareas
featured.subtitle: Vessel Management Financial System
featured.description: A comprehensive, production-ready financial management system designed specifically for vessel operations. Built with Laravel 12, Vue.js 3.5, TypeScript, Inertia.js, featuring complex business logic for fishing trips (Mareas), crew management, financial transactions with multi-currency support, automatic VAT calculations, maintenance tracking, and comprehensive reporting.
featured.longDescription: Bindamy Mareas is a comprehensive, production-ready financial management system designed specifically for vessel operations. This enterprise-grade application provides complete financial control and operational efficiency for fishing fleet operations. Built with Laravel 12.x, Vue.js 3.5 with Composition API, TypeScript 5.2 for full type safety, Inertia.js 2.1 with Server-Side Rendering, Tailwind CSS 4.1, PHP 8.3, and MySQL 8.0+. The system manages the complete lifecycle of fishing vessel operations including Mareas (fishing trips) with complete trip lifecycle management, crew assignment, catch tracking, and distribution profiles. Financial management features include complete CRUD for income, expenses, and transfers, multi-currency support with proper conversion, integer-based money storage (cents) to avoid floating-point errors, automatic VAT calculations with configurable rates, bank account tracking with real-time balance calculations, recurring transactions, and complete audit trails. The system includes crew management with complete registry, position management, invitation system, salary tracking, and compensation system. Additional features include maintenance management, comprehensive reporting and analytics with interactive charts, automation and background jobs, multi-factor authentication with TOTP, OAuth integration (Google and Microsoft), role-based access control with vessel-scoped permissions, complete audit logging, and document management. The architecture follows MVC pattern with service layer, includes 28+ database models, 30+ controllers, 50+ Vue components, and comprehensive documentation (10+ documentation files).

openSource.name: web-scrapper-football-matches
openSource.description: A powerful web scraper for extracting live match data from FlashScore.pt, with a modern frontend, REST API, SQLite database storage, and Docker support.
openSource.longDescription: A powerful web scraper for extracting live match data from FlashScore.pt, built with Python 3.12+ and Playwright for browser automation. The system features a normalized PostgreSQL database schema (Leagues, Teams, Matches), a comprehensive FastAPI REST API with multiple endpoints, and a modern responsive React frontend with TypeScript and TailwindCSS. Key features include automated web scraping with BeautifulSoup4 for HTML parsing, local image caching for team and league logos, Docker containerization with helper scripts, detailed file-based logging, and support for scheduled scraping runs. The application handles live match events including red cards and match minutes, advanced filtering by league and status, dark/light mode support, and provides a complete REST API for accessing match data.

openSource.name: ruby-blog-web-system
openSource.description: A modern, feature-rich blog management system built with Ruby on Rails 8. Features a beautiful admin panel, public-facing blog, Devise authentication, PostgreSQL database, TailwindCSS styling, Docker support, HashID integration for secure URLs, comment system, search functionality, and comprehensive testing with Rails testing framework.
openSource.longDescription: Ruby Blog Web System is a modern, feature-rich blog management system built with Ruby on Rails 8.0.2, featuring a beautiful admin panel, public-facing blog, and comprehensive content management capabilities.
